Author: thisaintheavymetal
Text: i’m not at home anymore, so sleeping and purging are both off the table. i’m with my friends and we’re gonna go swimming so i’m just trying to distract myself. i’m still uncomfortably full and super bloated, but i want to try and have fun. thank you for giving me a reality check.

Author: moon--princess
Text: I would urge not to just because its so hard to make it a one time thing. Once you start its always there as an option and its just so bad and doesn't get the calories out anyway. I would recommend trying to get some sleep to let your body digest and start feeling better.
